actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 5.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias under the authority of the order of Feb  3, 83. With written report No. 98-2.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of the "Standing Rules of the Senate" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on Rules and Administration to prepare a revised edition of S. Doc. 97-10, entitled "Standing Rules of the Senate." Authorizes the printing of such rules as a Senate document, including additional copies for the use of the Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of the "Standing Rules of the Senate" as a Senate document.
